Jokowi Beri Bambang Brodjonegoro Wakil Menteri
04 Nov 2019, 23:09 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Menristek Bambang Brodjonegoro. (CNN Indonesia/Feri Agus Setyawan)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- PresidenÂ Jokowi akan memberikan wakil menteri kepada Menteri Riset dan Teknologi Bambang S Brodjonegoro. Pemberian wakil menteri tersebut tertuang dalam Peraturan Presiden Nomor 73 Tahun 2019 tentang Kementerian Riset dan Teknologi. Dalam aturan yang ditandatangani Jokowi 24 Oktober lalu tersebut, pemberian wakil menteri diatur dalam Pasal 2. Dalam pasal tersebut, wakil menteri diberi tugas Jokowi untuk membantu tugas menteri dalam merumuskan atau melaksanakan kebijakan kementerian dan membantu menteri mengoordinasikan pencapaian kebijakan strategis lintas unit organisasi jabatan eselon 1 dan 2. Jokowi dalam pertimbangan peraturan tersebut mengatakan jabatan wakil menteri di Kementerian Riset dan Teknologi diberikan dalam rangka menjaga keberlangsungan pelaksanaan program dan kegiatan. Sebagai informasi, sebelum di Kementerian Riset dan Teknologi, Jokowi juga telah menunjuk 12 wakil menteri untuk membantu Kabinet Indonesia Maju. Mereka adalah Wakil Menteri Luar Negeri Mahendra Siregar, Wakil Menteri Pertahanan Sakti Wahyu Trenggono, Wakil Menteri Agama Zainut Tauhid Saadi, Wakil Menteri Keuangan Suahazil Nazara, Wakil Menteri Perdagangan Jerry Sambuaga. Selain itu, ia juga melantik Wakil Menteri Lingkungan Hidup dan Kehutanan Alue Dohong, Wakil Menteri Desa, Pembangunan Daerah Tertinggal dan Transmigrasi Budi Arie Setiadi, Wakil Menteri Agraria dan Tata Ruang/ Badan Pertanahan Nasional Surya Tjandra, Wakil Menteri BUMN Budi Gunadi Sadikin dan Kartika Wirdjoatmojo dan Wakil Menteri Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif Angela Tanoesoedibjo. Jokowi Gives Bambang Brodjonegoro Deputy Minister
Nov 04 2019, 23:09 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Minister of Research and Technology Bambang Brodjonegoro. (CNN Indonesia / Agus Setyawan Ferries)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - President Jokowi will give the deputy minister to the Minister of Research and Technology Bambang S Brodjonegoro. The deputy minister's award was stated in Presidential Regulation Number 73 of 2019 concerning the Ministry of Research and Technology. In the regulation signed by Jokowi on 24 October, the awarding of the deputy minister was regulated in Article 2. In this article, the deputy minister was given the task of Jokowi to assist the minister in formulating or implementing ministerial policies and helping the minister coordinate the achievement of strategic policies across echelon 1 organizational units and 2. Jokowi in consideration of the regulation said the position of deputy minister in the Ministry of Research and Technology was given in order to maintain the continuity of the implementation of programs and activities. For information, before at the Ministry of Research and Technology, Jokowi also appointed 12 deputy ministers to assist the Advanced Indonesian Cabinet. They are Deputy Foreign Minister Mahendra Siregar, Deputy Minister of Defense Sakti Wahyu Trenggono, Deputy Minister of Religion Zainut Tauhid Saadi, Deputy Minister of Finance Suahazil Nazara, Deputy Minister of Trade Jerry Sambuaga. In addition, he also appointed Deputy Minister of Environment and Forestry Alue Dohong, Deputy Minister of Villages, Disadvantaged Regions and Transmigration Budi Arie Setiadi, Deputy Minister of Agrarian and Spatial Planning / National Land Agency Surya Tjandra, Deputy Minister of BUMN Budi Gunadi Sadikin and Kartika Wirdjoatmojo and Deputy Minister of Tourism and Creative Economy Angela Tanoesoedibjo.
